short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A suite of modules that enhance your Snapzu browsing experience.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Snapzu Enhancement is a Reddit Enhancement Suite-like extension for the social website, Snapzu.

Features:

- Night mode

- Expandable image, text and video posts from the front page or tribe pages
